channel.title: CVE Feed for Supsystic -- Slider by Supsystic
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Supsystic -- Slider by Supsystic

item.title: CVE-2024-30448|2024-03-29T16:48:44.415Z -- Supsystic -- Slider by Supsystic
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Supsystic Slider by Supsystic allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Slider by Supsystic: from n/a through 1.8.10.

item.title: CVE-2024-30237|2024-03-28T04:43:07.688Z -- Supsystic -- Slider by Supsystic
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Supsystic Slider by Supsystic.This issue affects Slider by Supsystic: from n/a through 1.8.10.
